website_summaries.verdict: For hard-to-reach back hair, using this shaver is as simple as using a back scratcher.
pros: Does a better job than many electric trimmers at removing stubble
Long reach ensures that all hard-to-reach body parts will get attention
cons: Men with longer back hair will likely need to replace blade during the first shave

customer_reviews.title: It's not perfect like a razor on the face
customer_reviews.text: This works really well!!! I would have done this video, but I am a post op FTM, and didn't want to show anything else. I am not accustomed to back hair as not many men in my family have this issue just the ones that take after the Hungarian side (which I am the only grandchild that does), so I needed a device to make my back more smooth. It's not perfect like a razor on the face, but I went from being a slight bear to unless your really looking hard can't tell I have back hair. My back feels much smoother, and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Orion von Hubel

customer_reviews.title: garbage, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: garbage, waste of money. Thing is leaving serious burn marks and scratches across my back and not doing a good job of cutting the hair. Not for people with hair on back that is long. You have to have someone shave it down first and then you can use it. It felt like someone just tearing out my hair. Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Richards

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive. Shave could be better
customer_reviews.text: This product works. However, Refills are too ex pensive and blades only last for 2 shaves. I switched to the Bro
customer_reviews.author: B. Derschau

customer_reviews.title: Not that happy. It did do it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Not that happy. It did do it’s job, but instead of cutting the hair it pulled it out, caused my skin to slightly bleed. All in all my back hair was removed but it was painful.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Skipper

customer_reviews.title: dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Shaving your back is a pain in the butt. This is not the answer. It is waaaaaay too easy to slice your back open. I am surprised they can sell this as it is. If you slide a normal razor sideways, it can slice your skin. That's happened to all of us, right? So we are cautious to not slide the razor long-ways, so we don't get cut. With this thing, sliding it long-ways and slicing yourself open seems inevitable. You have less control of the razor, behind your back. And you have significantly less control when your hand is at the end of a 14-16 inch handle.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Was better off purchasing an electric razor
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Was better off purchasing an electric razor. If I can figure out how to video my experience and show how ineffective it is, I will. But, I will be returning this product. It's especially not worth the price point it's at.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been putting off shaving my back and shoulders for years for two reasons: First, it is a task that (until now) has been nearly impossible to do by yourself; I'm not the kinda guy who asks for help in my personal hygiene routine. Second: I was always concerned about hair regrowing under a shirt. However, when I saw the BackBlade, I thought it was cheap enough to try, so bought one I did. To my great surprize! It EASILY shaved the hair off my back and shoulders and regrowth is absolutely nothing! My only complaint is that they weren't around sooner!
customer_reviews.author: rusfirth3

customer_reviews.title: The blades that come with this horrible and will leave you permanently scarred.
customer_reviews.text: The blades that come with this are horrible and will leave you permanently scarred. What’s worse is when I contacted them about it they said that they already knew there was an issue with the blades and they were working on to improve them.
customer_reviews.author: Yahshua

customer_reviews.title: Far from working miracles
customer_reviews.text: It did the job ok, but don’t expect miracles; the flat sections of my back it did just fine. The areas with contour, not so much. It took about 10-15 minutes to do my back but there were still missed spots where the blade passed over but didn’t cut. What did get cut was the skin over both ends of the collar bone where it drew blood. The electric rechargeable mangroomer (also on Amazon) is safer, seems to get more nooks and crannies, and doesn’t result in a cut, irritated back. It doesn’t shave as closely as this one and leaves stubble, but that’s a better sacrifice that drawing blood. Oh well, it was worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Gelb

customer_reviews.title: I was able to shave half my back before blade was completely dull. Only replacement blades are from the company $$
customer_reviews.text: I have course hair but not a massive amount. I was able to shave half my back before blade was completely dull. Only replacement blades are from the company $$
customer_reviews.author: Stamped Graphix

customer_reviews.title: 0 will be better.
customer_reviews.text: This pulled more skin off than hair! Maybe the 2.0 will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product! It cut my back multiple times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! It cut my back multiple times and scraped me all over. I tried to post pictures of the carnage, but amazon removed the pictures because it was too bloody. I hurt for over a week! Avoid this product at all cost!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have had no problems with it. The only way I can see how people are cutting themselves is if they are not paying attention and are in a hurry. Which is the same for shaving your face. If you take your time and don't forcefully push the razor blade into your skin, rather just let it glide over your back it works perfect. It isn't a back scratcher so don't use it like one. Disregard the bloody photos they are obviously being careless. I use it to dry shave and have never had a single cut or irritation. Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. I am only on the first use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I am only on the first use, so this review is after one time. If the blades hold up for a good amount of uses this thing will be perfect. I see people writing that this was cutting there back. Go slow and dont be a hero. If you are going 100 mph then of course its going to cut your back. It is a blade after all.
customer_reviews.author: mpt310

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my fiancé as a Christmas gift. I was skeptical how it would work but figured if he used it awesome, if not it’s a funny gift. He doesn’t have Chewbacca level fur but does have some back and shoulder hair he hates and can’t reach with a regular razor. He said this was great! Got all the hard to reach spots, he said he even used it on his chest and stomach as well. I saw the results, couldn’t even tell there was hair there before. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Charlee

customer_reviews.title: This tears your back up big time. If you ...
customer_reviews.text: This tears your back up big time. If you are a hairy beast i would suggest it but if you keep it manicured regularly then this product does not leave it smooth. It took chunks out of my back and was never smooth. I wish i took a photo and i REALLY wish I would have returned it in a timely manner for a full credit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian-Sugar Land

customer_reviews.title: First Aid Supplies
customer_reviews.text: For the first time you try this product, you'll need 1) Neosporin, 2) an assortment of Band-Aids (get some large ones), and 3) someone to help apply the Neosporin and Band-Aids to the numerous cuts, nicks and outright slices on your back. I won't be giving it a second try; it's hitting the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works pretty well. I purchased it for light hair on shoulders and upper back as I wear a lot of tank tops. Not as close as a real shave as there is a built in guard, but plenty close for what I was looking for. Blade and guard look to be good quality. I will purchase refills when needed. This only comes with one blade. Definitely would not need the newer version with two blades.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Probably the worst hair removal product I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the trick is to this thing, I have tried both wet and dry and just about every angle and direction possible to use this on my back and it takes off maybe three hairs. I even watched a few youtube videos to see how other people do it and mimicked them, nothing. I guess it's back to the scratchy Mangroomer.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a hairy back buy this!!! This did a great job took 15 min on the first time using, could have taken less time if I wasn't so paranoid about getting cut which is nearly impossible if you follow the simple instructions. It left my back baby soft. My wife is so happy not having to help me again. It does a better job than my wife as well . Given I have only used it once, it would be nice if there was more of a curve on the handle , which version 2 has. I may have to buy that one. This did a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Phantom Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good initial results but poor lifespan
customer_reviews.text: The tool is ergonomic and makes it simple to reach difficult spots. However, the lifespan of the blade is too short as I had four "good" shaves where I didn't have to apply an excessive amount of pressure. After trying both dry and wet applications, and making sure the blade is clear of debris the tool does not perform without applying a lot of pressure- and even then the results are poor. I might consider a repeat purchase if the original sale included an extra blade, but for the initial cost of the tool (with only one blade) it is better to spend a little bit more initially and invest in an electric shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Parrot

customer_reviews.title: This product is perfect even for extremely hairy people!
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually write reviews. This is probably the best thing I ever bought on Amazon! I am a pretty hairy Italian! A lot hairy! I just got this in the mail today it took me 10 minutes to completely take all the hair off of my back! I did not even have to get in the shower with it. I did a dry shave and it didn’t hurt or give me any razor bumps or anything! It has a guard to protect Your skin from ever touching the blade. This product is perfect for someone who wants to shave in the comfort of their home or not have anybody do it for them!
customer_reviews.author: Carry the Torch

customer_reviews.title: Good solution to a growing problem
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this for several weeks now and overall I'm happy with the results. My back is not super hairy although it is getting thicker and coarser the older I get. Normally my wife shaves my back every couple of months, usually when she notices it and gets grossed out. With the BaKblade (I don't get the weird capitalization but whatever) I can hit my back once a week and keep it nice and smooth. I shave dry before I get in the shower. It's a bit awkward in a few spots, mainly due to musculature, but with some stretching and bending I can hit all the peaks and valleys successfully.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Adams

customer_reviews.title: Will destroy your shoulders. Awful
customer_reviews.text: I used this several times in the shower over a period of about 3 weeks and got terrible shoulder pain and problems. I've had rotator cuff trouble on my right shoulder now for months. I didn't have any problems with my shoulder before using this product and can safely say that using this product was the cause. Don't buy this, unless you have someone else use it on you, or it can really hurt you. I will probably need physical therapy, hopefully that will fix it. I wish I hadn't bought this. Not worth the risk.
customer_reviews.author: All Trades Jack

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I grow back hair really quickly, and it’s embarrassing asking someone if they can shave your back for you.. the BAKblade makes quick work of getting rid of the hair for you, and the best part is you can do it by yourself! I did what the other reviews said to do and did it before the shower! The very first time I did get a few scratches on my back, but that was because of user error! 10/10 would recommend! I’m such a fan I like to tell all my friends about it in real life
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Slow DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Could be better. Wish they would stop screwing around with the kick starter of the newer version of this and put it out to the public already. With this model it just doesn't curve (like the newer one will) to the contours of your back and shoulder. That being said Since there was no way to really reach these areas before I used to have it waxed. In comparison this is much cheaper. I would recommend that you not go too fast as I was able to slice my shoulder blade. Let me tell you what. Nothing hurts like a razor cut. Nothing hurts worse than a razor cut than one you can't reach.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch
